messages.content: Please give me a 3 day travel plan in Taiwan

Day 1
- Start the day with a Taiwanese breakfast in Taipei
- Visit Taipei 101
- Visit the National Palace Museum
- Walk down Guan Ze Street
- Visit the St. George's Church
- Have dinner in Nangang District

Day 2
- Visit the Presidential Palace
- Visit the Chiang Kai Shek Memorial Hall
- Visit the Dunhua Sensory Chamber
- Eat lunch at Din Tai Fung Restaurant
- Visit the National Chiang Kai Shek Memorial Hall
- Visit the Dr. Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall
- Visit the China Millennium Monument
- End the day with drinks and a view of Taipei City from the Taipei 101

Day 3
- In the morning, explore the Taiwanese breakfast scene
- Visit the National Sugar Museum
- Visit the Tainan City Wall
- Have dinner in Datong District
- End the night with a bar crawl in Ximending
